zyg0400.question: zyg0400
zyg0400.name: zyg0400
zyg0400.label: Did both twins get their first teeth at the same time?

items.text: Did both twins get their first teeth at the same time?
items.text_de: Haben die Zwillinge in etwa zur gleichen Zeit Zaehne bekommen?
items.description: Adapted from: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257–269: https://doi.org/10.1007/BF01065822
items.description_de: Adaptiert von: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21, (3) 257–269: https://doi.org/10.1007/BF01065824

answers.label: 1: Yes, both got the same teeth on the same side just a few days apart.
answers.label_de: 1: Ja, die entsprechenden Zaehne auf derselben Seite sind bei beiden nur um wenige Tage versetzt gekommen.

answers.label: 2: Yes, both got the same teeth but on different sides just a few days apart.
answers.label_de: 2: Ja, die entspr. Zaehne sind um wenige Tage versetzt gekommen, auf entgegenges. Seiten

answers.label: 3: Yes, both got different teeth just a few days apart.
answers.label_de: 3: Ja, verschiedene Zaehne sind nur um wenige Tage versetzt gekommen.

answers.label: 4: No, the twins got their teeth at quite different times.
answers.label_de: 4: Nein, die ersten Zaehne der Zwillinge kamen deutlich zeitversetzt.

zyg0702.question: zyg0702
zyg0702.name: zyg0702
zyg0702.label: Did a medical professional (e.g., family doctor, nurse, physician) ever tell you your twins' zygosity?

items.text: Did a medical professional (e.g., family doctor, nurse, physician) ever tell you your twins' zygosity?
items.text_de: Wurde Ihnen jemals von medizinischem Personal (z.B. Hausarzt, Krankenschwester, Facharzt) die Eiigkeit Ihrer Zwillinge mitgeteilt?
items.description: Adapted from: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257–269: https://doi.org/10.1007/BF01065819
items.description_de: Adaptiert von: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21, (3) 257–269: https://doi.org/10.1007/BF01065821

answers.label: 1: Yes, we were told that they are identical.
answers.label_de: 1: Ja, uns wurde mitgeteilt, dass sie eineiig sind.

answers.label: 2: Yes, we were told that they are non-identical.
answers.label_de: 2: Ja, uns wurde mitgeteilt, dass sie zweieiig sind.

answers.label: 3: No, we were never given any such information.
answers.label_de: 3: Nein, darueber wurde uns nichts mitgeteilt.

zyg0703.question: zyg0703
zyg0703.name: zyg0703

items.text: How did they make this determination?
items.text_de: Wie kam diese Aussage zustande?

zyg0800.question: zyg0800
zyg0800.name: zyg0800
zyg0800.label: When you look at early photographs of the twins when they were between 2 and 4, can you tell them apart without hints from clothing or other clues?

items.text: When you look at early photographs of the twins when they were between 2 and 4, can you tell them apart without hints from clothing or other clues?
items.text_de: Wenn Sie sich fruehe Fotos Ihrer Zwillinge im Alter von 2-4 Jahren anschauen, koennen Sie die beiden auseinanderhalten, ohne Merkmale der Kleidung oder andere Hinweise heranzuziehen?
items.description: Adapted from: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257–269: https://doi.org/10.1007/BF01065819
items.description_de: Adaptiert von: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21, (3) 257–269: https://doi.org/10.1007/BF01065821

answers.label: 1: Yes, I can tell them apart easily.
answers.label_de: 1: Ja, ich kann sie leicht auseinanderhalten.

answers.label: 2: Yes, but sometimes it is difficult.
answers.label_de: 2: Ja, aber manchmal ist es schwierig.

answers.label: 3: No, I very often mistake them for one another in photos.
answers.label_de: 3: Nein, ich verwechsele sie sehr oft auf Fotos.

answers.label_de: 1: sich aeusserlich glichen, wie "ein Ei dem anderen"

answers.label: 2: had a strong resemblance, like siblings

answers.label: 3: had no resemblance at all

zyg0900.question: zyg0900
zyg0900.name: zyg0900
zyg0900.label: We are also interested in knowing if there are other twins in your family. Which generation and which side of your family are they on (mother's side/father's side)? Multiple answers are possible.

items.text: We are also interested in knowing if there are other twins in your family. Which generation and which side of your family are they on (mother's side/father's side)? Multiple answers are possible.
items.text_de: Wir sind auch daran interessiert, ob es in Ihrer Familie weitere Zwillingspaare gibt. In welcher Generation und in welchem Teil Ihrer Familie (muetterlicherseits/vaeterlicherseits) gab oder gibt es Zwillinge? Sie koennen mehrere Angaben machen.
items.description: Adapted from: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257–269: https://doi.org/10.1007/BF01065819
items.description_de: Adaptiert von: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21, (3) 257–269: https://doi.org/10.1007/BF01065821

items.text: In the generation of your children (e.g. cousins/cousins of your children) (mother's side)
items.text_de: In der Generation Ihrer Kinder (z.B. Cousins/Cousinen Ihrer Kinder), muetterlicherseits
items.description: Adapted from: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257–269: https://doi.org/10.1007/BF01065819

zyg0920.question: zyg0920
zyg0920.name: zyg0920
zyg0920.label: For each set of twins in your family, please state whether they are identical/monozygotic or non-identical/dizygotic.

items.text: For each set of twins in your family, please state whether they are identical/monozygotic or non-identical/dizygotic.
items.text_de: Geben Sie bitte fuer jedes angegebene Zwillingspaar in Ihrer Familie an, ob diese eineiig oder zweieiig sind.
